Reviews.Title: Gateway NE71B06 USB 3.0 Port
Reviews.Author: Kenneth T.
Reviews.Content: This review is primarily about the location of the USB 3.0 Port.From the manual: "If a port is black, it is USB 2.0 compatible, ifit is blue it is also USB 3.0 compatible". You will probably need this port for a wireless mouse.After two days of ownership the computer has performed well for a relatively inexpensive laptop.Windows 8 is not easy to navigate, to me. The 17.3" screen is bright, big, & very viewable.Battery life is rated at 4.5 hours, which goes by very fast.

Reviews.Title: The best purchase yet!!
Reviews.Author: Lisa
Reviews.Content: I love this laptop.  I was skeptical because of the price compared to the stores. This purchase is truly a blessing to me.  It looks and performs perfectly.  It still has the original plastic . Thank you!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Decent for the money.
Reviews.Author: Daryl Wayne
Reviews.Content: I think this would probably have been better if Windows 8 wasn't on it. The performance, while frequently decent, can often get clunky and the resolution grainy and probably Windows 7 would be a better choice. Other than that, not a bad machine, but not a great one, either.

Reviews.Title: Just way confused by the newest Windows version.
Reviews.Author: Laurie
Reviews.Content: Computer is as described.  Love the screen size and speed of processor, quick shipment of product. But this newest version of Windows is driving me nuts.  Learning curve, I'll get it eventually.

Reviews.Title: Gateway pc...
Reviews.Author: Googlicious googlations
Reviews.Content: This is what I need in a pc. Good pc with a good price. Would that it had Bluetooth, but that's not a problem.  I'm an average user. Thanks Amazon for selling me a quality product and not junk. Had it 2 months and no problems!  Kudos!

Reviews.Title: Takes some getting used to.
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Pittman
Reviews.Content: Once you get used to how to operate this laptop, it is great!  I love it.  It is fast and has a huge screen!

Reviews.Title: Gateway
Reviews.Author: Robert C. Sullivan "Sox Fan in Tampa"
Reviews.Content: I liked this laptop. The screen is huge and very sharp. I think it boots slightly slower than I would like. I do have some issues with moving around but it is more with unfamiliarity with Windows 8 than Laptop. Overall, I really like this and glad I got it.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING
Reviews.Author: Will I Am
Reviews.Content: This recertified laptop is and has been getting all the WOW's from work to play.... I play a high-end 1st shooter game, and this thing handles all the intense graphics.... NO LAG !!!  Well serves it purpose both work/play....I would say this power house will be with me for years to come...Thanks Amazon...

Reviews.Title: Why wait buy this ASAP
Reviews.Author: Lady Droid
Reviews.Content: I am in love with this computer I just bought it today I am very familiar with the Windows 8 so this was a plus to see it on here it is very easy to use I will do a follow up in about 30 days so hold on tight because I am still checking out all the pros and cons oh and I dont know if it was stated on the description but there is Wi-fi on the laptop.Pros: The price is right, the screen is huge and everything is functioning perfectly (I bought this brand new not used or refurbished) the shipping was lighting speedCons: The updates take a very long time but once you have done it your good to go

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: PsychicMediumNikkiRose DOTcom
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my mother.  It worked well, but the DVD/CD drive didn't last.  For the price it was a decent buy.

Reviews.Title: Great computer
Reviews.Author: GuyInNowhereland
Reviews.Content: I love this little machine... it's been rock-solid for me since I bought it and is generally performs very well, is stable and reliable and was very reasonably priced. Would love another one at the same price... easy "yes" to this product, IMO.

Reviews.Title: could of been better
Reviews.Author: marcos
Reviews.Content: i think this laptop could of been but it was kind of slow could of been better. this laptop could of probably worked better with window 7.
